sentences.en: By nature inoffensive, friendly, and obliging, his presentation at St. James's had made him courteous.
sentences.cn: 生来不肯得罪人, 待人接物总是和蔼可亲, 殷勤体贴.而且自从觐见皇上以来, 更加彬彬有礼.

sentences.en: English bees are gentle and inoffensive creatures.
sentences.cn: 英国蜜蜂是一种温顺的、不伤害人的生物.

sentences.en: He is a quiet inoffensive person.
sentences.cn: 他是位安静、不冒犯别人的人.

sentences.en: He's such an inoffensive little man.
sentences.cn: 他是个无足轻重的小老头.

sentences.en: Her exultation being quite undisguised was singularly inoffensive.
sentences.cn: 她的欢欣因为是完全不加掩饰的,所以格外不惹人反感.

sentences.en: Her husband was a small, inoffensive-looking man.
sentences.cn: 她丈夫个子不高，看上去很随和。

sentences.en: His face habitually held an expression which was mild and inoffensive, almost apologetic.
sentences.cn: 他的脸上经常带着温和的、宽厚的 、 类乎歉意的表情.

sentences.en: It is the most inoffensive of the three.
sentences.cn: 它是三种中性情最温和的.

sentences.en: It's a very nice song. Catchy, and inoffensive.
sentences.cn: 这是首挺不错的歌，朗朗上口又不难听。

sentences.en: She's quiet, reserved, and doesn't speak her mind, she's also inoffensive and painfully selfless.
sentences.cn: 她很安静, 很沉默, 而且不会表明自己的内心, 同时也给人十分无私和无害的感觉.

sentences.en: The censors eviscerated the book to inoffensive to the President.
sentences.cn: 审查员删去了该书的精华以取悦于总统.

sentences.en: The censors eviscerated the book to make it inoffensive to the President.
sentences.cn: 审查员删去了该书的精华以取悦于总统。

trans.tran_en: unlikely to offend or upset anyone
